728539f-b.title: Richmond: Bay Street - Nautilus Street
728539f-b.text:
(1) and (2)
Bay Street, at the N.E. corner of Nautilus Street.
Shown are buildings of the United States Quarantine Station,
as seen from the Upper New York Bay. The house on the left
is the Doctor's Residence, about 100 years old.
P. L. Sperr  July 19, 1926
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(3)
The Cuarantine Station, seen from Cliff Street.
Viewing north.
April 29, 1931
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
728539f-b.folder: Bay Street & Nautilus Street, Staten Island, NY

728541f-b.title: Richmond: Bay Street - Nautilus Street
728541f-b.text:
(1)
Bay Street, at the N.E. corner of Nautilus Street, showing the
driveway into the U.S. Quarantine Station,and ground being broken
for a new building. The view is eastward toward The Narrows.
About December 3, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, another view.
About December 3, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

728542f-a.text:
Bay Street, at the N.E. corner of Nautilus Street.
Shown is the old Doctor's Residence of the U. S. Quarantine
Station, said to be 10O years old.
Septewber 15, 1935
P. L. Sperr
No REPRODUCTIONS
(2)
A view at a later date, showing the houde under
demolition.
Septeaber 4, 1936.
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS

728538f-a.text:
Bay Street, at the N.E. corner of Nautilus Street,
shown is the telegraph building of.the United Swates Quarantine
Station, near the shore of the Upper New York Bay.
July 19, 1926
Views 1, 2
P. L. Sperr

728540f-b.title: Richmond: Bay Street - Nautilus Street
728540f-b.text:
(1)
Bay Street, at the N.E. corner of Mautilus Street.
Shown is the U. S. Cuarantine Station as seen from the Upper
New York Bay. The old building on the left is the Western Union
telegraph office and on the right is the Doctor's Residence,about
100 years old. Visible too, is the steeple of St. Johns P. E.
Church.
August 17, 1934
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(2)
The old Western Union telegraph office and newly erected
buildings, seen from the interior of the Quarantine.
May 31, 1937
P. L. Sperr
NO RPPRODUCTIONS
728540f-b.folder: Bay Street & Nautilus Street, Staten Island, NY

NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)

About December 3, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.

728510f-a.title: Richmond: Bay Street - Evelyn Place
728510f-a.text:
1370 Bay Street, between Evelyn Place and Bope Avenue.
The Robinson map of 1898 shows it to have been the home of
John Larkin.
Abril 30, 1931
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIOONS
728510f-a.folder: Bay Street & Evelyn Place, Staten Island, NY
